entry.summary: ...Next round of snow for the Interior Wednesday evening into Thursday... entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 01 at 4:04AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...PATCHY DENSE FOG WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN SOUTH CAROLINA AND SOUTHEAST GEORGIA OVERNIGHT INTO WEDNESDAY MORNING...
